text: Character () is a 1997 Dutch Belgian period drama movie directed by Mike van Diem and based on the novel of the same name by Ferdinand Bordewijk. It stars Jan Decleir, Fedja van Huêt, Betty Schuurman, Victor Löw, Hans Kesting and won an Academy Award in 1998. ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Belgian movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Character (movie)
